name: Line Worlds
description:
Line Worlds
A Dancing Line Fan-game that has a level editor! (Currently only for Windows)

This is still in development, but you can give me feedbacks on it in my Discord server!

And since I don't want you to have any hassle downloading the files, I will only accept donations from my Ko-fi page

Special Thanks to:
- Cheetah Games (Original game developer)
- kidjanate (Game tester)
- Aexus (Game tester)
- yasirkula (Source code)
- HiddenMonk (Source code)
